DOC.brief_summary: The scientific aim of the present extension study is to monitor long-term safety and tolerability of idebenone in patients with DMD. Furthermore, the long-term effect on respiratory, cardiac and motor functions, and skeletal muscle strength/function will be assessed.
DOC.brief_title: Long-term Safety, Tolerability and Efficacy of Idebenone in Duchenne Muscular Dystrophy (DELPHI Extension)
